column1: Cost per conversation in INR, effective June 1, 2023

Note: Authentication-International rate applies for Indonesia as of June 1, 2024 and India as of July 1, 2024. Learn more: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/authentication-international-rates.
Note: Utility rates below apply as of August 1, 2024.
Note: Marketing rates below apply as of October 1, 2024.
Note: Service conversations are free as of November 1, 2024. Learn more: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-service-conversations.
Note: Utility rate below applies for Rest of Africa as of November 1, 2024.
Note: Authentication and authentication-international rates below apply for Egypt, Malaysia, Nigeria, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, South Africa and the United Arab Emirates as of February 1, 2025.
